summary: Represents a data field defined by a name, data type, description, and optional user-defined tags, offering standard equality, hashing, ordering, and string representations, along with helpers to create instances from feature objects or protobuf messages and to serialize back to protobuf.
business_intent: Provides a unified abstraction for dataset columns or feature definitions, enabling consistent identification, type enforcement, metadata management, and seamless conversion between internal structures and external representations such as protobuf or feature objects.
